title: Intelligence Collective (PROFESSEUR)
content:
1. Introduction to LLMs and Prompt Engineering
     - Definition of transformer and fine-tuning process for specific models
     - Overview of offline and online models for language modeling and prompt engineering
2. Experimental Results and Analysis of LLMs
     - Testing LLMs on a variety of tasks, including classification of email mailboxes
     - Analyzing latency between local and remote responses from prompt engine
3. Cybersecurity Security Concepts and Challenges
     - Diagnosis of encryption concepts (symmetric vs asymmetric) and protections against DoS attacks
     - Exploration of zero trust principles in the network perimeter
author: AI Orchestrator
